text: Darija Jurak and Anastasia Rodionova were the defending champions, but Rodionova chose not to participate this year. Jurak played alongside Pauline Parmentier, but lost in the first round to Monica Puig and Sloane Stephens. Tatjana Maria and Heather Watson won the title, defeating Kaitlyn Christian and Sabrina Santamaria in the final, 7–5, 2–6, [10–2]. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== *Main Draw Category:2018 Abierto Mexicano Telcel Abierto Mexicano Telcel - Women's Doubles
title: 2018 Abierto Mexicano Telcel – Women's Doubles
